name: Blasted Road Terror
description: Blasted Road Terror is real-time tactical looter in post apocalyptic setting. Command mighty warcrawler and manage squadron of vehicles in order to get unseen riches of the world and reach immortal glory.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows10 Processor: 1.2Ghz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: 1080p monitor resolution strongly recommended.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows10 Processor: 2Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: 1080p monitor resolution strongly recommended.
